about_the_game:
Top level stunt book series:
Divine anger * 1
Fighting 5 people * 1
Second action * 1
Real damage 10% * 1
100% spell combo * 1
Da Wu Yu Arrow * 1
45% ease of attack and defense * 1
First attack * 1
Immune to remote attacks * 1
Force Shield 10% * 1
Consumables (Baimaru Feast):
Awakening Lion Pill * 100
Cod balls * 100
Brown Bear Pill * 100
Cheetah Pill * 100
Sea Dog Pill * 100
Experience fruit * 100
Note: If you have purchased but have not claimed this DLC, please enter the "Start Game" interface of Steam Han Wu Emperor Zhuan. There is a "Manage My DLC" in the lower right corner of the interface. Remove all other checkmarks and only keep the hook for this DLC and the content addition package DLC to enter the game and claim it. After receiving it, check the other DLCs. Only one operation is required, and once successful, all archives will be permanently valid.
The original value of this gift pack was 3000 RMB, but it has been sold with a broken bone and there are no further discount activities.
If you have any questions, please contact customer service email: 392788593@qq.com Official QQ group: 985109086 (there are strategies and senior chess players to communicate in the group)

Consumables (Baimaru Feast):
Awakening Lion Pill * 100
Cod balls * 100
Brown Bear Pill * 100
Cheetah Pill * 100
Sea Dog Pill * 100
Experience fruit * 100
Note: If you have purchased but have not claimed this DLC, please enter the "Start Game" interface of Steam Han Wu Emperor Zhuan. There is a "Manage My DLC" in the lower right corner of the interface. Remove all other checkmarks and only keep the hook for this DLC and the content addition package DLC to enter the game and claim it. After receiving it, check the other DLCs. Only one operation is required, and once successful, all archives will be permanently valid.
The original value of this gift pack was 3000 RMB, but it has been sold with a broken bone and there are no further discount activities.
If you have any questions, please contact customer service email: 392788593@qq.com Official QQ group: 985109086 (there are strategies and senior chess players to communicate in the group)
